General.Name: Jiangxi Hungpai New Material Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangxi Hungpai New Material Co., Ltd. engages in the research, manufacture, and sale of functional silanes, nano-silicon materials, and other chemical additives worldwide. The company provides saline coupling agents comprising sulfur-silane, amino silane, chloroalkyl silane, thiocyanato silane, alkyl silane, phenyl silane, epoxy silane, and vinyl silane coupling agents. It also offers anti-reversion agents, chlorosilane, silicate ester, fumed silica, antioxidants, anti-adhesion agents, antiozonant wax, and processing agents. In addition, the company provides thermal insulation materials, including aerogel insulation blankets, coatings, and slurries, as well as nanoporous thermal insulation materials and aerogel particles. Its products are used in automobiles, rubber products, construction, medicine, and medical industries. The company serves tire manufacturers. Jiangxi Hungpai New Material Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Jingdezhen, China.
